patient_info: Trismus,Hyperhidrosis,Syncope,Vomiting,Loss of consciousness,Right bundle branch block,ST segment elevation
golden_diagnosis: Brugada syndrome 2,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 6,Brugada syndrome 5,Brugada syndrome 4,Brugada syndrome 8,Brugada syndrome 9,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1,Brugada syndrome 7,Brugada syndrome 3,Brugada综合征/Brugada Syndrome, BrS/Brugada syndrome/Brugada syndrome 1
predict_diagnosis:
1. Metabolic disorder (e.g., hyperkalemia, hypoglycemia)
2. Heat stroke or exertional heat illness
3. Neurogenic syncope (e.g., due to vasovagal syncope, carotid sinus syncope)
4. Cardiovascular disorder (e.g., myocardial infarction, arrhythmia)
5. Brainstem stroke or injury
6. Central nervous system (CNS) infection or inflammation (e.g., meningitis, encephalitis)
7. Epileptic seizure
8. Masticatory muscle disorder (e.g., myopathy, fibromyalgia)
9. Hyperthyroidism or other endocrine disorders
10. poisoning or drug overdose (e.g., cholinergic poisoning, sympathomimetic overdose)

Please note that this list is not exhaustive, and further evaluation and testing would be necessary to narrow down the diagnosis. The clinical presentation is quite complex, and it may be challenging to pinpoint the exact cause without more detailed information.
